title: Pediatric health researchers offer insights for RSV vaccine

title_detail.value: Pediatric health researchers offer insights for RSV vaccine

summary: In healthy adults, RSV, or respiratory syncytial virus, feels like the common cold with a runny nose, chest congestion and cough. However, it is the second leading cause of death in infants.

summary_detail.value: In healthy adults, RSV, or respiratory syncytial virus, feels like the common cold with a runny nose, chest congestion and cough. However, it is the second leading cause of death in infants.
